items.title: Look at This Stuff, Isn’t It Neat?
items.description: Make your collection of bookish goods complete.

items.title: The Bestselling Books of the Week, According to All the Lists
items.description: USA Today, Publishers Weekly, NYT, Amazon, and Indie Booksellers all have their own bestseller lists. Here are the combined results.

items.title: 10 Stories of Real Black Women in History
items.description: Black women's stories are often erased from history lessons. These nonfiction and historical fiction books place them front and center.

items.title: Take a Picture Book, It’ll Last Longer: 8 Recent Award-Winning Picture Books
items.description: From the Caldecott to the Stonewall Book Award, these picture book awards will help you discover the best recently published picture books.

items.title: Native American Tales About Space Aliens—and More SFF Links
items.description: Daniel H. Wilson talks about Hole in the Sky and Native American first contact stories—plus, more SFF book news.
